## ExtraFieldTool.getExtraField() method

Get extra field value by key. If it does not exists, return undefined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getExtraField(item: Zotero.Item, key: string): string | undefined;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | Zotero.Item |  |
